includedAssets.title: Zoolander
includedAssets.synopsis: Ben Stiller plays Derek Zoolander, an appallingly vacuous male model who routinely wins the Male Model of the Year contest. However, groovy newcomer Hansel (Owen Wilson) - replete with skateboard, blonde locks and hippy-drippy philosophy - wrests the title from the king of the catwalk. Coincidentally, Zoolander's fall from grace in the fickle world of fashion handily ties in with design mogul Mugatu (Will Ferrell) and his search... for an assassin. Stiller, who also wrote and directs, doesn't exactly use a scalpel to carve up the fashionistas... more like a cartoon sledgehammer to pulp the whole gaudy, multi-million pound industry.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Model Ben Stiller is suddenly yesterday's face when cool Owen Wilson becomes the toast of the fashion world.

includedAssets.title: Zoolander 2
includedAssets.synopsis: Ben Stiller's dim-witted supermodel must save the day when someone starts murdering pop stars. Comedy sequel with Owen Wilson.

includedAssets.guidanceText: flashing images, strong language, sex, violence

includedAssets.title: Zoolander Movie Box Set
includedAssets.synopsis: Ben Stiller's dim-witted supermodel Derek Zoolander is twice forced to save the world in this double-bill of smash-hit comedies. First, after finding himself overtaken as the world's best model by newcomer Hansel McDonald (Owen Wilson), Derek, along with journalist Matilda Jeffries (Christine Taylor) works to uncover a sinister fashion industry conspiracy. Years later, after sinking into irrelevance, Derek and Hansel are called upon to use their particular skills to solve a series of pop star assassinations. Will Ferrell, Milla Jovovich, Penelope Cruz and Kristen Wiig also star.

includedIn.title: Zoolander
includedIn.synopsis: Dim-witted supermodel Derek Zoolander takes time out from the catwalk to investigate a fashion industry assassination plot and then a killer targeting pop stars.
includedIn.shortSynopsis: Dim-witted supermodel Derek Zoolander takes time out from the catwalk to expose a fashion industry assassination plot and find a pop star killer.
